name: pnp-devproxy-postmark-rate-limiting-errors
title: Simulate rate limiting and errors on Postmark APIs
shortDescription: This sample contains a preset to simulate rate limiting and random errors on Postmark APIs. Postmark APIs support rate limiting, which is a mechanism that informs developers of the available server resources and allows them to increase the data throughput by staying under the rate limits and avoiding throttling.
